Html:
I hope the name of my issue isn't to misleading, because i know how important it is to have the correct buffs checked in rawr. And that is not my problem.

I have looked and looked, and i wasn't able to find any topic who was adressing my problem here.

My problem is: why does rawr load my mage with all the buffs she normally have on a raidnight, and not on any other of my chars?

I have tried to delete rawr and all rawr files, and re-install it many times, but its always the same; the buffs are there on my mage. Now im not complaining about it, because it always saves me some time,

but im not sure if its intended from rawr.
Some models apply Default Buffs when a new character is created, others do not. We have not standardized this and left it up to the individual Dev.
Okay thanks for the answer - glad to know thats its not an issue with my rawr settings.
